name: Sleepy Sheep (Aceholder)
description:
My second prototype where the only limitation was, that the game must count something and display this count.

In Sleepy Sheeps you count sheep, which are falling from the sky with the goal to sleep in their stable in the middle of the screen. To help them achive their goal, you can move bouncy platforms left and right.

After the timer reaches zero you can see how many sheep you made happy.
